name: Flow through the Sky
description:
Time is running out, and I am only a one-person team, so I'll make this quick.

Once you walk in the hatch door, press SPACE to start gameplay.
Alternatively, you can walk off the platforms to start gameplay.

Avoid the black spheres, and collect the rings and white stars.

Collecting 7 rings restores the two double jumps the player has.

ARROW KEYS = MOVE
UP = when falling, performs an air jump
R = restart the game
